FuncDef: The display netstream statistics command displays IPv4, IPv6, or VXLAN flow statistics. The display netstream statistics command displays IPv4, IPv6, or VXLAN flow statistics.
CLIs: display netstream statistics { ip | ipv6 | vxlaninner-ip } slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the inner packet of the IPv4 type for VXLAN packets.
-

Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: You can run this command to query IPv4, IPv6, or VXLAN flow statistics on a device, including the statistics clearance time, number of packets of different lengths, traffic statistics collection mode, and statistics on different flows.
